summary: This document is an email chain from July 2020 between law enforcement officials and Amazon's legal counsel regarding a subpoena (20 Mag. 6216) for records related to shipments to a target address in Bradford, NH, and orders for individuals including Ghislaine Borgerson and Jennifer Turner. Amazon reports no shipments to the address and no records for Borgerson, while requesting more information on Turner.

persons.name: Ben Langner
persons.context: Amazon employee communicating with law enforcement about the subpoena response, indicating no records found for the target address or Ghislaine Borgerson.

persons.name: Jeffrey Goldberg
persons.role: Associate General Counsel, Litigation & Regulatory at Amazon
persons.context: Amazon's legal point of contact for the subpoena, coordinates the response and mentions an emergency process for law enforcement requests.

persons.name: Ghislaine Borgerson
persons.context: Individual named in the subpoena for Amazon order records; Amazon reports no responsive orders for her during the relevant time frame.

persons.name: Jennifer Turner
persons.context: Individual named in the subpoena for Amazon order records; Amazon requests additional identifying information to search for her records.

connections.description: Both are Amazon legal counsel working together on the law enforcement subpoena response.
Langner is responding to a subpoena requesting records for Borgerson, reporting no orders found.
Langner is responding to a subpoena requesting records for Turner and asks for more identifying information.

events.title: Subpoena served on Amazon
events.description: Law enforcement serves subpoena 20 Mag. 6216 on Amazon for records related to a target address and individuals.

events.title: Amazon provides subpoena response
events.description: Amazon communicates that no records were found for shipments to the Bradford, NH address or for Ghislaine Borgerson, and requests more info on Jennifer Turner.

keyFacts: A subpoena (20 Mag. 6216) was issued to Amazon for records related to shipments to a target address in Bradford, NH, and orders for Ghislaine Borgerson and Jennifer Turner.
Amazon reported no records of orders shipped to the Bradford, NH address during the relevant time period (May 1, 2020, to present).
Amazon found no responsive orders for Ghislaine Borgerson during the relevant time frame.
Amazon requested additional identifying information for Jennifer Turner to search for her records.
The email chain reveals coordination between law enforcement and Amazon's legal team to expedite the subpoena response.
